oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various interviews - Biff Collie - 1982-12-04
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of interviews with Charlie Louvin (performer), Hank Snow (performer), and Charlie Walker (performer), conducted by Biff Collie on December 4, 1982.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Charlie Louvin radio spots for Biff Collie -- Biff Collie microphone check -- Collie and Hank Snow talk and joke -- Biff Collie compliments Snow's vocal control -- Snow thanks Biff and talks about wondering if fans think his vocals have changed over the years -- Snow talks about the material he chooses to sing on the Grand Ole Opry -- Snow talks about Nova Scotia being pretty -- Snow talks about sailing the Atlantic Ocean as a cabin boy and his duties -- Snow talks about when he decided to pursue music -- Snow talks about the Country Music Hall of Fame being the greatest honor one could receive as an artist -- Snow talks about how he got a contract on his first record -- Snow talks about his record Lonesome Blue Yodel and how it was inspired by Jimmie Rodgers -- Snow talks about Ace Joseph, Cecil Landry, Steve Shoals, and Ernest Tubb being very memorable people in his life, just to name a few -- Snow talks about his Child Abuse Foundation (incomplete) -- Snow talks (incomplete) -- Snow talks about the Foundation finally coming together -- Snow talks about why he feel so strongly about ending child abuse -- Snow talks about all the programs created by his foundation -- Snow talks about his recording Moving On and that Biff provided a line for the song -- Charlie Walker does an introduction for Biff Collie -- Walker talks about wanting to pursue sports but then becoming inspired to make music -- Walker talks about early performances and how he'd get paid money via tips in a hat -- Walker talks about artists really make money for their traveling rather than their short performances -- Walker talks about being from Nevada and moving to Texas -- Walker talks about his first radio job -- Walker talks about Ernest Tubb being his biggest inspiration (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Collie, Biff; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011; Snow, Hank; Walker, Charlie, 1926-2008;
